title: Issues loading into games?
body:
So, this has been an on and off problem for a while now and I'm just now making  a post about it to bring this to someones attention. 

There have been many times in the last month where my game will either not load in at all, leaving me on a screen with the background and bare boarders, but no, names, icons champions, ping or loading percentages... For about 5 minuets and it won't let me tab out at all to end the program. After this absurd time frame it then starts loading in at a pace so inconsistent, I find it baffling (and a bit upsetting as I'm obviously being punished for this with Low Priority Queue). This computer hasn't had many major issues with it before and it only seems to happen during some patches. Apparently this is one of them. I wend into the RADS file and found the .txt from my recent game and will post it should it be needed. After a quick look over it (despite most of it being tech stuff I can't even begin to hope to comprehend) seems to be a enormous amount of assets that just show up with errors. I got the Hextech Repair tool and I ran one test and I'm running a second one with repatch active to see if that solves anything. I'll provide both .zip folders should those be desired to look at as a before/after sort of thing so I can avoid this in the future. If someone could get back to me on this as soon as possible that'd be fantastic.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're getting a black screen after champion select, which is usually caused by a connection problem failing to download assets.  I see that you've done a lot of troubleshooting here, but I suggest instead running through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities with your network.  If you've made any modifications to your game files, it may be best to first run the repair via the HRT first.  

If the issue persists after gong through each step then hold on to those logs and let me know.

If you've made any modifications to your game files, it may be best to first run the repair via the HRT first.  
> 
> If the issue persists after gong through each step then hold on to those logs and let me know.

Had the game black-screen on me this time, then when (after a bit of a fight with the application) I closed it and pulled up the base client to try and reconnect from my hidden icon tray near my computers clock (As I was using the legacy Client because I've encountered a TON of running issues with the new client) to try and press the reconnect button that SHOULD have popped up in the "Game in progress" box, which should have mentioned that I'd left a game and needed to reconnect, but got no such button. So after fiddling about getting the entire program closed using my task manager, I then restarted the game and used the new client to see what'd happen. It tires to reconnect me and it stops dead at 100% and the pinwheel in the bottom stops spinning. I'd figured the client had crashed AGAIN (Turns out it had done the "connection timed out" error window that never properly tabs me to it when it shows up) and the game was over instead of booting me out immediately. It did not add to my leaverbuster punishment that was ongoing (Oddly as every other time in recent times this has happened, it has), and that's about it. 

I may just be screwing this up on my own but I've not been doing anything differently and have in fact been closing extra background programs as of late!

Thanks for the update!  I'm more and more convinced that you have an unstable connection on your hands that isn't strong enough to get you through to the game servers or stay connected.  Were you able to run through the connection guide as suggested, and making sure to run through each step?

If you've made any modifications to your game files, it may be best to first run the repair via the HRT first.

> If the issue persists after gong through each step then hold on to those logs and let me know.

Time is 4:30PM PST and there's about 2 mins left to a Low priority queue, and I'm waiting for an ARAM. Will give an update on how that loading goes!

One major lag spike at about 4:45 but other than that the game only paused for five seconds before loading me in. 

Though for clarification it wasn't the 'black screen' it was the champion loading windows and the background with no indications of any champions or usernames and such, as well as a frozen loading wheel in the bottom. Odd enough but this time things went well. Should things persist I'll make another post here. 

In the meantime I'll try and tank through the last few Low-pri games.
Yup been happening to me too
